The administrative centre is Phuentsholing. Chukha is the commercial and the financial capital of Bhutan. Chukha District is divided into eleven village blocks: *Bjacho Gewog *Bongo Gewog *Chapcha Gewog *Dala Gewog *Dungna Gewog *Geling Gewog *Getena Gewog *Logchina Gewog *Metakha Gewog *Phuentsholing Gewog Category:Districts of Bhutan *Sampheling Gewog
title: Chukha District
